results.overview: A newlywed couple visits the husband's hometown of Geneva, where they are subjected to threats stemming from the death of his former fiancée.
results.title: The Sweet Body of Deborah

results.original_title: The Secret War of Harry Frigg
results.overview: When 5 allied generals are captured in Italy in WWII, it is a propaganda nightmare for the allies. The generals are all 1 star and refuse to take orders from each other in order to plan an escape. Harry Frigg is a private who has escaped from the guard house dozens of times. He is promoted to Major General and ordered to get the generals out once he is captured. Harry is willing to escape, but then he meets the countess...
results.title: The Secret War of Harry Frigg

results.overview: A heartwarming story about a group of small, seemingly insignificant creatures who discover their inner strength and courage, banding together as a team to overcome significant challenges, demonstrating the importance of responsibility and the power of working together, even when faced with seemingly insurmountable odds.
results.title: Tiny Heroes

results.overview: A black and white silent movie, based on the Snow White fairy tale, that is set in a romantic version of 1920s Seville and centered on a female bullfighter.
results.title: Blancanieves

results.overview: Julia Law, a young paralegal, is found dead in a bathtub. Her boss, a prominent Philadelphia lawyer, is questioned by the authorities.
results.title: The Girl in the Bathtub

results.overview: College student Danielle must cover her tracks when she unexpectedly runs into her sugar daddy at a shiva - with her parents, ex-girlfriend and family friends also in attendance.
results.title: Shiva Baby

results.overview: Paranoia sets in as the Black Death strikes European villagers in the 14th century.
results.title: Black Plague

results.overview: A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking and deflowering virgins.
results.title: Kids

results.overview: A short film.
results.title: Six Degrees

results.overview: In this mockumentary, Kevin Smith plays himself covering the story of a New Zealand town after the discovery that a local shellfish, the geoduck (pronounced "gooey duck") has the properties of Viagra.
results.title: Love Mussel

results.overview: Raymond Avila is an ex-gang member trying to build a future. His kid brother Chuco is a sullen low-rider still caught up in the life. Despite their differences, their family bond is strong. But that bond is violently tested when rivals challenge Chuco's gang and ignite a neighborhood war.
results.title: Boulevard Nights

results.overview: War in Abkhazia, 1992. An Estonian man Ivo has stayed behind to harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo is forced to take him in.
results.title: Tangerines

results.original_title: ギニーピッグ4 ピーターの悪魔の女医さん
results.overview: A doctor conducts experiments on patients which end up in anguish!
results.title: Guinea Pig Part 4: Devil Doctor Woman

results.overview: Three aspirational gangsters risk their criminal careers whilst botching a kidnapping job.
results.title: The Three Wise Men

results.overview: An intimate, behind-the-scenes look at performance, glamor, fame, family, love and sacrifice as some of the world's most renowned drag queens come together for World Pride in Toronto.
results.title: This Is Drag

results.overview: A group of friends run a popular travel vlog that helps fund their adventures. The leader of the group brings along her younger sister for the next scuba diving trip to an isolated cove. But when their plane crashes, the two sisters must use their strength, resourcefulness and immense courage to survive a pack of great white sharks.
results.title: Frenzy

results.overview: Christopher is under a lot of stress at work and decides to undergo a surgical procedure that makes you listen to your favorite song all the time.
results.title: The Procedure

results.overview: An ex-con takes a job driving a truck cross country. What he doesn't know is that the truck is filled with illegal weapons and now he must fight to survive and save his family.
results.title: Black Dog

results.overview: Zoey, a cyber crime cop, and Barry, a detective, raise their son, Timmy, in a quiet suburban neighborhood. When Zoey confides in her best friend about shift work and the lack of spark in her marriage. Zoey's mind is set in motion and when she discovers Barry is screwing around, she calls him out. Willing to give him a second chance, Zoey tries to mend her marriage. When Barry is seen again with "that" woman, Zoey gets a restraining order and sole custody of Timmy. Late one night a fire in her home tragically takes the life of her son. The evidence points to Zoey taking sleeping pills and smoking - she's charged with Timmy's murder. Zoey goes to Barry for help but he's distant and blames her. Zoey fights back, convinced she was set up to take the blame for Timmy's death. As she fights to prove her own innocence she gets the biggest shock of all.
results.title: Sole Custody

results.overview: The mountain-village passions of a German widow and her sons unfold in the style of a 1920s expressionist movie.
results.title: Careful
